Clash.NAME: Clash
Clash.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 additional [R] for each non-Attack card in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage.

Corruption.NAME: Corruption
Corruption.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose 2 HP and gain 3 Strength.
Corruption.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, lose 2 HP and gain 3 Strength.

Demon Form.NAME: Demon Form
Demon Form.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Skills cost 0. NL Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.
Demon Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Skills cost 0. NL Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.
